title: Storm Surge eSports Recruitment

embed.description: The latest Tweets and replies from Storm Surge eSports (@StormSurgeEspor). OOL Pro team, Looking to join the OCS TOP : Solomeh Jungle : N/A MID : I am Forrest ADC : Ryaku Support : N/A. Australia

body:
LF a Jungle main in the Elo of  Plat+
LF a Support main in the Elo of Plat+

LF ADC sub Plat+
 We as a team were in the OOL came 4th dident make it to OCS, Looking to rebuild

ADD I am Forrest for more details.  Thank you

replies.body: Hey I am interested I main support u can contact me by adding me in game i am plat 3 and other d 5
Keen for a scrim when ur team is sorted out?
